data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Dagana.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dagana, Bhutan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 2 believers in Dagana to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 599 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Dagana to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, help your children in Dagana, Bhutan find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Santal people.
Spirit, please defend the 2 believers in Dagana against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Dagana, Bhutan to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Dagana, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

location.name: Dagana
location.people_groups_list: Rajbansi Khen (Hindu traditions), Namassej (Hindu traditions), Kayastha (Hindu traditions), Mech, Lodha (Hindu traditions)
